item.title: Teaching
item.description: Current from 2021/22: Topics in Distributional Macroeconomics (PhD) — Tinbergen Institute (Amsterdam) since 2020/21: Networks in Economics and Finance (Master) — U Amsterdam — course website since 2020/21: Microeconomics (Bachelor) — U Amsterdam Past 2018–2020: TA for Economic Policy (mechanism design, political economy, applications in monetary, fiscal, growth and competition policies, taught by Hans Peter Gr√ºner) – Undergraduate — U Mannheim 2015: TA for Mathematics 2 (topological, metric, normed spaces; correspondences; convexity) — Graduate — IHS Vienna 2015: TA for Econometrics 2 (linear, multivariate time series analysis, taught by Manfred Deistler) — Graduate — IHS Vienna
